text: Oberhausen is a municipality in Neuburg-Schrobenhausen in Bavaria in Germany. Oberhausen combines historic Oberhausen, Unterhausen, Sinning and Kreut. Neighboring communities include Rennertshofen, Burgheim, Ehekirchen, Rohrenfels, KÃ¶nigsmoos and Neuburg an der Donau. Bahnhof Unterhausen is the local train station. ==References== ==Other websites== *www.gemeinde- oberhausen.de -- official website (in German) *www.sisby.de -- Municipal Facts Category:Neuburg-Schrobenhausen
title: Oberhausen (near Neuburg)
